name: pwa-complete-guide
description: A complete guide to PWAs. Building a simple Instagram clone.

scripts.copypublic: copyfiles -e public/sw/*.* -u 1 public/**/**/* public/**/* public/* build
scripts.minify: uglifyjs public/js/app.js -o build/js/app.min.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs public/js/feed.js -o build/js/feed.min.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs public/js/fetch.js -o build/js/fetch.min.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs public/js/helper.js -o build/js/helper.min.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs public/js/idb.js -o build/js/idb.min.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs public/js/media.js -o build/js/media.min.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs public/js/promise.js -o build/js/promise.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run generatesw && npm run copyroot && npm run copypublic
